Player History
Drafted in 12th round, 180th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/4/2015...
Injured on 4/20/2015 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for entire career...
Was claimed off waivers by Brooklyn on 5/2/2016.
Had first career hit on 6/6/2016, off William Kinch (NY)...
Signed as a free agent by New York on 2/22/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Injured on 5/21/2017 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/14/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $2,150,750 per year...
Released by Cincinnati on 8/14/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/8/2020 to a 3-year deal worth $500,001 per year...
